item.title: Github Issue Tracker
item.description: VueJS frontend to aggregate Github issues through their GraphQL API, deployed on Vercel

item.title: Talk: GraphQL in SilverStripe - Reasons and Demo App (Stripecon Malta 2017)
item.description: Talk at Stripecon Malta in 2017. I’ve built a PoC, demonstrating the new GraphQL module exposing Silverstripe CMS data through a simple app built on React Apollo, and deployed on Zeit (which has been rebranded to Vercel). See slides and talk recording.

item.title: Talk: Fitting GraphQL into a CMS data model (Wellington PHP Meetup 2017)
item.description: Lightning talk for the Wellington PHP Meetup, about the challenges of matching an ActiveRecord style ORM in a PHP-based CMS with GraphQL’s type language. See slides.
